name: A Burning Addiction
description:
Welcome to "A Burning Addiction", a thrilling 2D roguelike top-down endless wave game that will test your skills to the limit. In this game, you will only need to control the movement of your player, but be prepared to face countless enemies that will stop at nothing to take you down.

You'll have an arsenal of deadly weapons at your disposal, including fireballs, electric pulses, axes, and bats. Use them strategically to defeat your foes and survive as long as possible. But be warned, your enemies will become increasingly more challenging as you progress through the waves.

The game features a levelling system where you'll gain experience points (XP) by defeating enemies. Use these points to level up and acquire or upgrade weapons to improve your chances of survival.

As you play, collect coins to spend in the shop located at the main menu. Here, you can purchase new weapons or upgrade existing ones to help you on your quest. With a vast array of weapons and upgrades to choose from, you'll never run out of ways to customize your gameplay experience.

So what are you waiting for? Dive into the addictive gameplay of "A Burning Addiction" and see how long you can survive the endless waves of enemies.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a school project where we had to make a game in 1 week, it had to be like Vampire Survivors, so this is what I came up with.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move Around
